dcterms:description: A benchmark dataset created from Wikipedia to evaluate language models' factuality by contrasting factual statements with non-factual variations.
dcterms:title: Wiki-FACTOR

dcterms:creator: Guilherme Penedo

dcterms:description: A dataset based on news articles from Reuters, designed to evaluate language models' factuality through a similar contrastive approach.
dcterms:title: News-FACTOR

dcterms:creator: Chaitanya Malaviya
Subin Lee

dcterms:description: A dataset based on expert-curated question-answer pairs, aimed at evaluating language models' ability to generate factual information in specialized domains.
dcterms:title: Expert-FACTOR
